resources.string:
About Redmote Application

Version: 1.0
Android SDK Version: 2.1
Created By: Mark Fazzio
3D Renderings: Dominick Bizzarri

About Redmote Module

Output Voltage: 4.5v
LED Wavelength: 940nm
Battery Replacement: enercell #317 (x3)
Circuit: "All About Circuits" forum
Special Thanks: "hobbyist"

Contact Info

Mark Fazzio
mark@markfazzio.com

Redmote Universal Remote Codes

Redmote uses the standard Phillips RC5 
codes -- for now. The next update will 
include a wider range of manufacturers 
to make Redmote even more universal!
